column2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od @293b gsal ba'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba don 'di nyid rgya cher ston gsal ba'o // te / bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so //

column1: aSp  missing aSp  t tatra mahA vajra ISvaraH idam tattva hRdayam agAt
column2: aa:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do // rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro // don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro // chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro // thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas / rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so // h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga @294a *// rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do // byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o // sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o // dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang; yi ger 'drir 'jug pa pa'o // dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o /// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te / bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di / smras so //

column1: om vajra netrIByaH svAhA
column2: aom/

column1: aSp  aTa BagavAn anantA paryanta nizWaH taTAgataH paryanta anizWa DarmA punar
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa / sems can thams cad 'dul nus pa / yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa / sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul @294b 'di bshad do // sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas / khro bo mnyam pa nyid do // sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas / khro bo 'dul ba nyid do // sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro bo chos nyid do // sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid do // de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub po // de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te / bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so // ha; de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do // thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do do // // thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do // thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do // thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig @295a *// gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas / don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so // h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa / rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no // thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no // ngag thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no // sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas / sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no // de nas phyi rol kyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te / de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo // dr'i / de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te / mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / @295b sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo // bhyo: de nas sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te / tshigs mthun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo // sv'a: de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te / rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo //

column1: api asya kalpasya parinizWA aDizWAna arTam imam sarva Darma samatA parinizWA aDizWAna vajram nAma prajQApAramitA anaya arTam aBAzata prajQApAramitA ananta tayA sarva taTAgata ananta tA

column1: om akAra muKe
column2: aom aa zhes bya ba'i sgo //

column1: om prajQApAramite
column2: aom shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /

column1: om am vam hUm om aH
column2: a'am bam h'um aa aom/

column1: om sarva taTAgatakAya agre
column2: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog /

column1: om sarva taTAgata vAc viSudDe
column2: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ram par dag pa /

column1: om sarva taTAgata citta vajre
column2: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aa: aom aa / sdig pas bcings pa thams cad chos shig / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar par gyis shig / aom dam tshigs thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um trat/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //

column1: aSp  na ayam vajrapANe nava ropita kuSala mUlAnAm sattvAnAm karNa puwe nipatizyati
column2: lag na rdo rje / 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro // 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am / yi ger 'dri ba 'am / yi ger 'dir gzhug pa 'am / bklag pa 'am / 'chang ba 'am / bsgom pa 'am /

column1: na api anavaropita kuSala mUlEH sattvEH SakyaH liKitum paWitum DArayitum vAcayitum satkartum gurukartum mAnayitum pUjayitum
column2: bsti stang du bya ba'am / ri mor bya ba 'am / mchod par mi nus so //

column1: anyatra bahu budDa avaropita kuSala mUlAH te sattvAH Bavizyanti yaH imam prajQApAramitA naya muKam Darma paryAyam antaSas eka akzaram api Sr kim punar sakalam parisamAptam
column2: gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru @298b gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos / lag na rdo rje /

column1: yena kenacid vajrapANe SIti gaFgA nadI vAlukA samAni budDa kowi niyuta Sata sahasrANi na satkRtAni na guru kRtAni na mAnitAni na pUjitAni Bavanti tena na SakyaH ayam prajQApAramitA Anaya muKaH Darma paryAyaH Srotum
column2: gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang g'a'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod pa ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grang 'di thos par mi nus so //

column1: tasmAt cEtya BUtaH pRTivI pradeSaH Bavizyati yatra ayam Darma paryAyaH pracarizyati
column2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro //

column1: vandanIyaH ca sa pudgalaH bahu kalpa kowI Bavizyati yasya ayam Darma paryAyaH kAya gataH vA pustaka gataH vA Bavizyati
column2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam / glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //

column1: jAtismaraH ca bahu kalpa kowI Bavizyati
column2: de bskal ba bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //

column1: na ca asya mAraH pApIyAn antarAyam karizyati
column2: de la bdud sdig to can par chad byed par mi 'gyur ro //

column1: catvAraH ca asya mahA rAjAnaH pRzWatas pRzWatas samanubadDAH Bavizyanti rakzA AvaraNa guptaye anyAH ca devatAH
column2: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro //

column1: na ca vizama aparihAreNa kAlam karizyati
column2: ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //

column1: sarva budDa boDisattva samanvAhRtaH ca Bavizyati
column2: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //

column1: samAsatas yatra budDa kzetre AkAFkzizyate tatra tatra upapatsyate
column2: mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o //

column1: evam bahu anuSaMsaH prajQApAramitA Anaya muKaH Darma paryAyaH api ca pradeSa mAtram mayA kIrtitam iti
column2: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig @299a *// brjod do //

column1: aSp  idam avocat BagavAn
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /

column1: Atta manasaH vajrapANi pramuKAH boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sA ca sarvAvatI parzad sa deva mAnuza asura ganDarvaH ca lokaH BagavataH BAzitam aB
column2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
